sections.heading: County Treasurer; Maintenance of Office in Conjunction With Other Offices Prohibited.Section 48.122 - County Treasurer; Separate Office Provided.
sections.text:
It shall be unlawful to establish or maintain any county office in connection with the county treasurer's office in any county in this state.

History:1919, Act 90, Eff. Aug. 14, 1919 ;-- CL 1929, 1276 ;-- CL 1948, 48.121

sections.heading: County Treasurer; Separate Office Provided.
sections.text:
The boards of supervisors of each county in this state shall provide a separate and distinct office for the county treasurer of their respective county.

History:1919, Act 90, Eff. Aug. 14, 1919 ;-- CL 1929, 1277 ;-- CL 1948, 48.122
